com.hyphenate.chat

Class EMOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyphenate.chat.EMOptions

  • public class EMOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    chat options for IM enable/disable delivery ack, enable/disable server ack, enable/disable hyphenate friend management, etc..
